tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reasons_for_return (
  return_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  reason TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE return_categories (
  category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE return_feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  return_id UUID,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
